name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open haiku reader”
”Tell haiku reader to read me a haiku”
”Open haiku reader and get me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader allows you to listen to 10 different haikus at random. The main phrase for activating the skill is: "haiku reader". Therefore to start it, just say "Alexa, (open, tell, or ask) haiku reader" and then request the content to be reproduced. Below are some practical examples.

Example Phrases:
"Alexa, open haiku reader and get me a haiku."
"Alexa, tell haiku reader to read me a haiku."
"Alexa, ask haiku reader to tell me a haiku."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
